Verses: 1 yobe, En Nyaayangalaik Kelum; En Vaarththaigalukkellaam Sevikodum.
2 idho, En Vaayai Ippodhu Thirandhen; En Vaayilirukkira En Naavaanadhu Pesum.
3 en Vaarththaigal En Irudhayaththin Unmaikku Oththirukkum; Naan Arindhadhai En Udhadugal Suththamaai Vasanikkum.
4 dhevanudaiya Aaviyaanavar Ennai Undaakkinaar; Sarvavallavarudaiya Suvaasam Enakku Uyirkoduththadhu.
5 ummaale Koodumaanaal Enakku Marumozhi Kodum; Neer Aayaththappattu Enakku Edhiraaga Nillum.
6 idho, Ummaippola Naanum Dhevanaal Undaanavan; Naanum Manninaal Uruvaakkappattavan.
7 idho, Neer Enakku Bayappattuk Kalangath Thevaiyillai; En Kai Ummel Baaramaayirukkamaattaadhu.
8 naan Kaadhaarak Ketka Neer Sonnadhum, Enakkuk Kelviyaana Ummudaiya Vaarththaigalin Saththamum Ennavendraal:
9 naan Meerudhal Illaadha Suththan, Naan Kutramatravan, Ennil Akkiramamillai.
10 idho, Ennil Avar Kutrampidikkap Paarkkiraar, Ennaith Thamakku Saththuruvaaga Ennikkollugiraar.
11 avar En Kaalgalaith Thozhuvile Maatti, En Nadaigalaiyellaam Kaavalpaduththugiraar Endru Sonneer.
12 idhile Neer Needhiyullavar Allavendru Umakkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga Sollugiren; Manushanaip Paarkkilum Dhevan Periyavaraayirukkiraar.
13 avar Thammudaiya Seyalgal Ellaavatraiyunkuriththuk Kaaranam Sollavillaiyendru Neer Avarode En Vazhakkaadugireer?
14 dhevan Oruvisai Solliyirukkira Kaariyaththai Irandaamvisai Paarththuth Thiruththugiravarallave.
15 kananiththirai Manusharmel Irangi, Avargal Padukkaiyinmel Ayarndhirukkaiyil,
16 avar Raakkaalaththu Dharisanamaana Soppanaththile Manusharudaiya Sevikkuth Thaam Seyyum Kaariyaththai Velippaduththi, Adhai Avargalukku Varum Thandanaiyinaale Muththiraipottu,
17 manushan Thannudaiya Seygaiyaivittu Neengavum, Manusharudaiya Perumai Adangavum Seygiraar.
18 ivvidhamaai Avan Aaththumaavaip Padukuzhikkum, Avan Jeevanaip Pattaya Vettukkum Thappuvikkiraar.
19 avan Than Padukkaiyile Vaadhaiyinaalum, Than Sagala Elumbugalilum Agoramaana Novinaalum Dhandikkappadugiraan.
20 avan Jeevan Appaththaiyum, Avan Aaththumaa Rusigaramaana Pojanaththaiyum Arosikkum.
21 avan Maamsam Kaanappadaadhapadikku Azhindhu, Moodappattirundha Avan Elumbugal Velippadugiradhu.
22 avan Aaththumaa Paadhaalaththukkum, Avan Praanan Saavukkum Sameebikkiradhu.
23 aayiraththil Oruvaraagiya Saamaasipannugira Thoodhanaanavar Manushanukkuth Thammudaiya Nidhaanaththai Arivikkumpadikku, Avanukku Anusaariyaayirundhaareyaagil,
24 avar Avanukku Irangi, Avan Padukuzhiyil Irangaadhapadikku: Neer Avanai Ratchiyum; Meetkum Porulai Naan Kandupidiththen Enbaar.
25 appozhudhu Avan Maamsam Vaalibaththil Irundhadhaippaarkkilum Aarokkiyamadaiyum; Than Vaalavayadhu Naatkalukkuth Thirumbuvaan.
26 avan Dhevanai Nokki Vinnappam Pannumpodhu, Avan Avarudaiya Samugaththai Gembeeraththode Paarkkumpadi Avar Avanmel Piriyamaagi, Andha Manushanukku Avanudaiya Needhiyin Balanaik Koduppaar.
27 avan Manusharai Nokkip Paarththu: Naan Paavancheydhu Semmaiyaanadhaip Purattinen, Adhu Enakkup Prayojanamaayirukkavillai.
28 en Aaththumaa Padukuzhiyil Irangaadhapadi, Avar Adhai Ratchippaar; Aagaiyaal En Praanan Velichchaththaik Kaanum Endru Solluvaan.
29 idho, Dhevan Manushanudaiya Aaththumaavaip Padukuzhikku Vilakkugiradharkum, Avanai Jeevanullorin Velichchaththinaale Pragaasippikkiradharkum,
30 avar Ivaigalaiyellaam Avanidaththil Palamurai Nadappikkiraar.
31 yobe, Neer Gavaniththu En Sollaik Kelum; Naan Pesappogiren, Neer Mavunamaayirum.
32 sollaththakka Nyaayangal Irundhadheyaanaal, Enakku Maruuththaravu Kodum; Neer Pesum, Ummai Needhimaanaagath Theerkka Enakku Aasaiyundu.
33 ondrum Illaadhirundhadheyaagil Neer En Sollaik Kelum, Mavunamaayirum, Naan Umakku Gnaanaththai Ubadhesippen Endraan.
